articles.author: Joe Middleton
articles.title: Macron calls for ‘new European political community’ that could include Britain - The Independent
articles.description: Emmanuel Macron suggests new European political community based on core values in areas such as security and energy
articles.content: Emmanuel Macron has said the UK could be offered a closer relationship with Brussels as part of a new type of political European community that would include countries that havent joined the EU or ha… [+2845 chars]
